name: Island Zed
description:
A Game so complex you will only scratch the surface.

You have awoke from a terrible night. A world full of pixels and wildlife, this is going to be an interesting experience. A gun is placed in front of you, Survive.

A roaming boar catches your eye, you prowl towards it, do not scare it. You raise your gun and shoot. Hunt.

Strolling through the terrain you notice clues, small clues to something bigger, something only you can find. Explore.

Hunt. Survive. Explore.

Update 2.7:

  • Improved AI
  • Improved Models
  • Bug Fixes
